Class ToDisk

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project0.RevatureDatabase.ToDisk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Project0.LogReference

    public class ToDisk
extends java.lang.Object
implements Project0.LogReference
    ToDisk encapsulates the logic of writing to persistent storage.
